The same spirit that attacked our SON has NOW attacked you. What you said about 2017 elections was absurd; yes you are known to be a controlled girl, very intelligent but hio shetani alikuweza.  Sabina tafadhali kuja tuombe ndio huyo saitani akuondokee wewe na our beloved SON. That handshake spirit is demolishing warriors of the moutain,we must defeat it!
